entities.description: A stimulant that comes in crystal or powder forms and can be smoked, snorted, swallowed, or injected.
Variable representing whether the respondent has ever used methamphetamine.
Variable representing the age at which the respondent first used methamphetamine.
Variable representing the year the respondent first used methamphetamine.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent has ever used methamphetamine.
Indicates the age at which the respondent first used methamphetamine.
Indicates the year in which the respondent first used methamphetamine.
